name: Ethan Perkins
text: Takes forever to get vehicles back.

name: Scott Dorfman
text: We had bought a cart several years ago and had a great experience.  We have tried since last August to get in touch and no one answered phone or returned call or emails to buy new cart.  Went by during posted hours and gate was lock.  Don’t know if they’re still in business but if they are they need to start being a little reponsive.

resp.text: Sorry to hear you are having such trouble. We are here Monday-Friday from 8am to 5pm. Please call 334-745-0660 during those hours, please leave a message if lines are busy and we will promptly get back with you. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: D Man
text: Good people they do a lot for their community and Jerry craft is an amazing mechanic

name: Oscar Goode iii
text: Needed a trailer and they were just great and they are military friendly.

resp.text: Thank you Oscar for the review! Glad we were able to meet your need!

name: Sara Jones
text: Very helpful business people. I have bought 3 carts over the last few yeats.

resp.text: Thank you Sara for the review and the 5- Stars!

name: Brian Gordy
text: Always great customer service, and a friendly smile. Funcarts has been our go to for all of our carts at Phenix Drag Strip.

resp.text: Thank you Brian! We are always happy to serve you!

name: Lori L
text: We have been to this place twice now during their posted business hours, the gate is locked and no one answers the phone but the recording says they are open....hard to sell a golf cart that way. We will move on to another merchant.

resp.text: We have solved that business hours problems, hope you won't give up on us! Thank you considering us in the first place.

name: Knotheads Fishing
text: Verrrrrry good place to buy your kart and the mechanic Jerry top notch guy knows and explains everything you need to know. Very helpful with the purchase also will build custom karts for you if you'd like A1 grade A

resp.text: Thank you Clint for supporting small businesses like ours!

name: Donreco Glaze
text: Great for your golf cart needs

name: mark mitchell
text: Prices are high talked to owner told him i would be back in few days when i went back employee s didn't want to honor owners prices said they would have him call me been a week and half no call yet

resp.text: We will work on our communication break down, Sorry you were disappointed!
We try! Thanks for the Reveiw
